name: Catrobat
description:
Unfinished Endless Runner for WhiskerJam.

Take the role of a cat leaping from object to object in an endless runner where you need to press the right key at the righ time to make the gap!

Be warned it's harder than you think! *insert evil laugh*

More props,  jumps and animations, plus  balancing, wall climbs and more to be added in the future!
